SupportPage.seo.title: Support & Partnership | HeyTCM
SupportPage.seo.description: Join HeyTCM and help shape the future of intelligent Traditional Chinese Medicine. We welcome your support and collaboration.
SupportPage.seo.og.title: Support & Partnership | HeyTCM

SupportPage.head.title: HeyTCM - Support Us

SupportPage.ldjson.name: Support & Partnership | HeyTCM
SupportPage.ldjson.description: Join HeyTCM and help shape the future of intelligent Traditional Chinese Medicine. We welcome your support and collaboration.

SupportPage.ldjson.name: HeyTCM Smart TCM Platform
SupportPage.ldjson.description: A cloud platform integrating TCM theory with modern technology for intelligent health management, supporting multi-device access, data analytics, and personalized health services.

SupportPage.bannerSection.title: Support HeyTCM, Empower the Future of Smart TCM
SupportPage.bannerSection.subtitle: Pioneering the digital transformation of Traditional Chinese Medicine
SupportPage.bannerSection.desc: Join HeyTCM and help drive the intelligent evolution of TCM. We welcome your partnership and support.
SupportPage.bannerSection.quote: The journey to preserve and innovate TCM is challenging, requiring ongoing data and financial contributions. This is not mere charity, but a shared exploration of value. Every bit of your support lights the way for TCM's future.

SupportPage.supportSection.title: Support Us
SupportPage.supportSection.desc: Choose a support plan that fits you and help advance intelligent TCM.

otherWays.title: Spread the Word
otherWays.description: Recommend HeyTCM to friends, share your experience, and help grow our community.

otherWays.title: Play Games (Watch Ads)
otherWays.description: Support us by watching ads while playing TCM games—every view helps fund the project.

otherWays.title: Join Community Discussions
otherWays.description: Answer questions, join discussions, foster a welcoming community, and help new users.

otherWays.title: Contribute to Open Source
otherWays.description: Help improve HeyTCM by coding, fixing bugs, or developing new features.

otherWays.title: Share Health Data
otherWays.description: Anonymously and securely share your health data to support research and algorithm improvement.

otherWays.title: Participate in Research
otherWays.description: Volunteer for research projects and help validate our products' effectiveness.

SupportPage.volunteerSection.title: Join Our Journey
SupportPage.volunteerSection.desc: We're looking for talent in tech, content, operations, and medicine to help build the future of smart TCM.

SupportPage.selectedPlanSection.title: Your Selection:
SupportPage.selectedPlanSection.thanks: Thank you for supporting HeyTCM! Click below to complete your payment and start your journey into smart TCM.

SupportPage.testimonialsSection.title: What Our Supporters Say
SupportPage.testimonialsSection.desc: Hear from those who have joined the HeyTCM community

testimonials.name: Dr. Li
testimonials.content: As a TCM practitioner, I'm delighted to see modern technology quantifying TCM theory. HeyTCM's data visualization helps my patients better understand their health, improving treatment adherence.

testimonials.name: Ms. Wang
testimonials.content: My whole family uses HeyTCM. As an engineer, I appreciate its open-source philosophy. My parents, who weren't keen on health management before, are now engaged thanks to the gamified approach and traditional wellness knowledge.
